DocAttribute.Name: Elements
DocAttribute.Documentation: The group of units and their exponents that define the derived unit.

DocAttribute.Name: UnitType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Name of the derived unit chosen from an enumeration of derived unit types for use in IFC models.

DocAttribute.Name: Dimensions
DocAttribute.Documentation: Dimensional exponents derived using the function IfcDerivedDimensionalExponents using (SELF) as the input value.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Units as such shall not be re-defined as derived units.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR2
DocWhereRule.Documentation: When attribute UnitType has enumeration value USERDEFINED then attribute UserDefinedType shall also have a value.
